alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 11:44PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette and Dixie Counties through 1245 AM EST... At 1144 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dowling Park to 30 miles southwest of Horseshoe Point. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Cross City, Horseshoe Point, Suwannee, Horseshoe Beach, Shamrock, Clara, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Old Town, Buckville, Jonesboro, Hatch Bend, San Pedro Junction, Cooks Hammock, Chancey, Guaranto Springs, Jena, Alton and Mayo Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EST for Big Bend of Florida.
